com.mesosphere.sdk.http

Class RequestUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mesosphere.sdk.http.RequestUtils

  • public final class RequestUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Utilities for handling HTTP requests from clients.

    • Method Detail

      • parseJsonList

        public static java.util.List<java.lang.String> parseJsonList(java.lang.String payload)
                                                      throws JSONException
        Parses a JSON list payload in the form of a string, returning the corresponding Java list.
        Throws:
        JSONException - if the provided string could not be parsed as a JSON list

      • filterPodTasks

        public static java.util.Collection<TaskInfoAndStatus> filterPodTasks(java.lang.String podName,
                                                                     java.util.Collection<TaskInfoAndStatus> podTasks,
                                                                     java.util.Set<java.lang.String> taskNameFilter)
        Returns a new list which contains only the tasks for a given pod which matched the provided task names. For example, a task named "foo" in "pod-0" will be returned if the filter contains either "foo" or "pod-0-foo".

      • readData

        public static byte[] readData(java.io.InputStream inputStream,
                              FormDataContentDisposition fileDetails,
                              int sizeLimit)
                       throws java.io.IOException
        Reads the content of the provided payload, enforcing the specified size limit, while being permissive/dismissive about provided Content-Length in the header metadata.
        Parameters:
        inputStream - The input stream containing the data
        fileDetails - The HTTP header details of the stream
        sizeLimit - limit in bytes for the returned data, or no limit if <= 0
        Returns:
        the resulting buffer
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the stream is missing, or its size exceeds sizeLimit
        java.io.IOException - if copying the stream's data failed
